title: Ribeiro
body: Individuals with this surname, according to Dr. Alvaro de Azevedo, descend from Manuel Afonso Sanha and his wife Leonor Ribeiro, who passed away in 1536. There was also a Pedro Ribeiro, who married Mecia Carvalhal, and both lived around 1500, and their descendants came to be known as Carvalhais.

Dr. Alvaro de Azevedo: Source of information about the surname Ribeiro
